-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | minisat driver as backend for satchmo
--   
--   this driver calls minisat (download from http:<i></i>minisat.se/) to
--   solve CNF-SAT constraints produced by satchmo
@package satchmo-minisat
@version 1.3

module Satchmo.Solver.Minisat
solve :: SAT (Decoder a) -> IO (Maybe a)
